active-window.colorize-icons-description: Apply theme colors to active window icon.
active-window.hide-mode-description: Controls how the widget behaves when no window is active.
active-window.scrolling-mode-description: Control when text scrolling is enabled for long window titles.
active-window.show-app-icon-description: Display the application icon next to the window title.

audio-visualizer.color-name-description: Select the color for the visualizer.
audio-visualizer.hide-when-idle-description: When enabled, the visualizer is hidden unless a player is actively playing.
audio-visualizer.hide-when-idle-label: Hide when no media is playing

battery.device-description: Select which battery device to display.
battery.display-mode-description: Choose how the battery is displayed in the bar.
battery.hide-if-idle-description: Hide the widget when the battery is not charging or discharging.
battery.hide-if-not-detected-description: Hide the widget when no battery is detected on the system.
battery.show-noctalia-performance-description:
Display the Noctalia Performance Mode toggle inside the battery panel.
Disables shadows and animations in Noctalia to reduce resource usage.
battery.show-power-profile-description: Display the power profile selection inside the battery panel.

brightness.apply-all-description: Change brightness for every monitor when using the scroll wheel.
brightness.apply-all-label: Apply scroll changes to all monitors

clock.clock-display-description: Customize your clock's display by adding tokens from the list below. To use the 12-hour format, you must include the 'AP' token.
clock.custom-font-description: Select a custom font for the clock display.
clock.horizontal-bar-description: Tip: Use \n to create a line break.
clock.tooltip-format-description: Format string for the tooltip shown when hovering over the clock. Leave empty to use the default tooltip.
clock.use-custom-font-description: Override the default font selection with a custom font for the clock.
clock.use-monospaced-font-description: When enabled, the clock will use the monospaced font.
clock.vertical-bar-description: Use a space to separate each part onto a new line.

control-center.enable-colorization-description: Enable colorization for icon, applying theme colors.
control-center.icon-description: Select an icon from the library or a custom file.
control-center.use-distro-logo-description: Use your distribution's logo instead of a custom icon.
control-center.use-distro-logo-label: Use distro logo instead of icon

custom-button.collapse-condition-description: If the output text matches this value, the button will collapse.
custom-button.color-selection-description: Apply theme colors to icon and text.
custom-button.display-command-output-description: Enter a command to run at a regular interval. The first line of its output will be displayed as text.
custom-button.display-command-output-stream-descriptio: Enter a command to run continuously.
custom-button.enable-colorization-description: Enable colorization for the custom button icon and text, applying theme colors.
custom-button.general-tooltip-text-description: Custom text to display in the button's tooltip.
custom-button.hide-mode-description: Controls widget visibility when the command has no output.
custom-button.icon-description: Select an icon from the library.
custom-button.ipc-identifier-description: Unique identifier for IPC commands. Use this identifier with 'qs -c noctalia-shell ipc call cb [action] [identifier]' to control this button via IPC.
custom-button.left-click-description: Command to execute when the button is left-clicked.
custom-button.max-text-length-horizontal-description: Maximum number of characters to show in horizontal bar (0 to hide text).
custom-button.max-text-length-vertical-description: Maximum number of characters to show in vertical bar (0 to hide text).
custom-button.middle-click-description: Command to execute when the button is middle-clicked.
custom-button.parse-json-description: Parse the command output as a JSON object to dynamically set text and icon.
custom-button.right-click-description: Command to execute when the button is right-clicked.
custom-button.show-exec-tooltip-description: Show tooltips with command details (left/right/middle click, wheel).
custom-button.show-icon-description: Toggles the visibility of the widget's icon.
custom-button.show-text-tooltip-description: Show tooltips with the output from the text command.
custom-button.text-stream-description: Streamed lines from the command will be displayed as text on the button.
custom-button.wheel-description:
Command to execute when the scroll wheel is used.
Use $delta for the scroll wheel delta in the command.
custom-button.wheel-down-description: Command to execute when the scroll wheel is scrolled down.
custom-button.wheel-mode-separate-description: Enable separate commands for wheel up and down.
custom-button.wheel-up-description: Command to execute when the scroll wheel is scrolled up.

lock-keys.hide-when-off-description: Hide the indicator when the key is not active.

media-mini.compact-mode-description: Enable a space-saving layout for the media player panel.
media-mini.hide-mode-description: Controls how the widget behaves when no media is playing.
media-mini.max-width-description: Sets the maximum horizontal size of the widget. The widget will shrink to fit shorter content.
media-mini.panel-section-description: Configure the appearance and behavior of the media player panel.
media-mini.scrolling-mode-description: Control when text scrolling is enabled for long track titles.
media-mini.show-album-art-description: Display the album artwork for the currently playing track.
media-mini.show-artist-first-description: Display artist - title instead of title - artist.
media-mini.show-progress-ring-description: Display a circular progress indicator showing track progress.
media-mini.show-visualizer-description: Display an audio visualizer when music is playing.
media-mini.use-fixed-width-description: When enabled, the widget will always use the maximum width instead of dynamically adjusting to content.
media-mini.visualizer-type-description: Choose the style of audio visualizer to display.

notification-history.hide-widget-when-zero-description: Hide the notification icon when there are no notifications.
notification-history.hide-widget-when-zero-unread-description: Hide the notification icon when there are no unread notifications.
notification-history.hide-widget-when-zero-unread-label: Hide icon when no unread notifications
notification-history.show-unread-badge-description: Display a badge showing the number of unread notifications.
notification-history.unread-badge-color-description: Select the color for the unread notification badge.

system-monitor.compact-mode-description: Display stats as mini bar charts instead of text values. Prevents layout shifting.
system-monitor.cpu-frequency-description: Display the current CPU clock speed in GHz.
system-monitor.cpu-temperature-description: Show CPU temperature readings if available.
system-monitor.disk-path-description: Select which disk mount point to monitor.
system-monitor.gpu-temperature-description: Show GPU temperature readings if available.
system-monitor.memory-percentage-description: Show memory usage as a percentage instead of absolute values.
system-monitor.network-traffic-description: Display network upload and download speeds.
system-monitor.storage-as-percentage-description: Show disk space as percentage instead of absolute values.
system-monitor.storage-available-description: Shows how much disk space is available instead of how much is used.
system-monitor.use-monospace-font-description: Use monospace font for consistent character width.
system-monitor.use-padding-description: Pads the text values with leading spaces to prevent layout shifting.
system-monitor.use-padding-description-disabled-monospa: A monospace font is needed for this feature.
system-monitor.use-padding-description-disabled-vertica: Vertical taskbar does not support padding text.

taskbar.colorize-icons-description: Apply theme colors to taskbar icons.
taskbar.hide-mode-description: Controls how the widget behaves when there are no matching windows.
taskbar.icon-scale-description: Sets the scaling factor for taskbar icons.
taskbar.max-width-description: Maximum width of the taskbar as a percentage of screen width.
taskbar.only-active-workspaces-description: Show only apps from active workspaces.
taskbar.only-same-monitor-description: Show only apps from the monitor where the bar is located.
taskbar.show-pinned-apps-description: Show pinned apps from the dock in the taskbar.
taskbar.show-title-description: Display window titles in the taskbar.
taskbar.show-title-description-disabled: Vertical taskbar does not support showing titles.
taskbar.smart-width-description: Automatically adjust entry width based on the number of entries.
taskbar.title-width-description: Set the width of window titles in the taskbar (in pixels).

tray.chevron-color-description: Apply theme colors to the drawer chevron icon.
tray.colorize-icons-description: Apply theme colors to tray icons.
tray.drawer-enabled-description:
When enabled, unpinned tray items are shown in a drawer panel.
When disabled, all tray items are shown inline.
tray.hide-passive-description: When enabled, tray items with 'Passive' status will be hidden.

volume.display-mode-description: Choose how you'd like this value to appear.

workspace.character-count-description: Number of characters to display from workspace names (1-10).
workspace.empty-color-description: Set the background color for empty workspaces.
workspace.enable-scrollwheel-description: Switch between workspaces using the mouse scroll wheel.
workspace.focused-color-description: Set the background color for the focused workspace.
workspace.follow-focused-screen-description: Display workspaces from the currently focused screen, rather than the screen where the bar is located.
workspace.grouped-border-opacity-description: Set the opacity level for workspace container borders.
workspace.label-mode-description: Choose how workspace labels are displayed.
workspace.occupied-color-description: Set the background color for occupied workspaces.
workspace.pill-size-description: Adjust the size of workspace pills.
workspace.reverse-scrolling-description: Reverse the direction of workspace switching when scrolling.
workspace.show-applications-description: Display application icons inside each workspace.
workspace.show-badge-description: Show the workspace number badge in grouped mode.
workspace.show-labels-only-when-occupied-descripti: Only show workspace labels when they contain windows.
workspace.unfocused-icons-opacity-description: Set the opacity level for unfocused app icons.

panel.enable-message: Enable Bluetooth to see available devices.
panel.pairing-mode: Make sure your device is in pairing mode.

error.fetch-failed: Unable to load changelog data. Please try again later.
error.rate-limit: GitHub rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a few minutes.

panel.empty: Release notes are not available yet.
panel.subtitle-fresh: Thanks for installing Noctalia! Here is what’s included in this build.
panel.title: What's new in {version}

power-profile.tooltip-disabled: Install power-profiles-daemon to use power profiles

providers.calculator-deprecated: The >calc command is deprecated and will be removed soon. Please type math expressions directly in search instead.
providers.clipboard-clear-description-full: Remove all items from clipboard history
providers.clipboard-history-disabled-description: Enable clipboard history in settings or install cliphist

panel.description: Your notifications will show up here as they arrive.

about.noctalia-desc: A sleek and minimal desktop shell thoughtfully crafted for Wayland, built with Quickshell.
about.supporters-desc: A huge thank you to our amazing supporter!
about.supporters-desc-plural: A huge thank you to our {count} amazing supporters!
about.system-install-hint: Install fastfetch to view system information
about.telemetry-desc: Help improve Noctalia by sharing anonymous system info (screen resolution, compositor, distro). Sent once at startup, no tracking, data auto-deleted after 30 days.
about.title: About

audio.devices-desc: Configure available audio input and output devices.
audio.devices-input-device-description: Select the desired audio input device.
audio.devices-output-device-description: Select the desired audio output device.
audio.external-mixer-description: Enter the command or application path to launch when activating the external audio mixer feature.
audio.media-desc: Set your preferred and ignored media applications.
audio.media-excluded-player-description: Add keywords for players you want the system to ignore. Each keyword should be on a new line.
audio.media-frame-rate-description: Higher rates are smoother but use more resources.
audio.media-primary-player-description: Enter a keyword to identify your main player.
audio.media-scrolling-speed-description: Time in seconds for the title to scroll from start to end.
audio.media-scrolling-title-description: Enable continuous scrolling for long media titles.
audio.on-middle-clicked-description: Command to execute when the button is middle-clicked.
audio.panel-applications-empty: No applications are currently playing audio
audio.title: Audio
audio.visualizer-type-description: Choose a visualization type for media playback.
audio.volumes-desc: Adjust volume controls and audio levels.
audio.volumes-mute-output-description: Mute the system's main audio output.
audio.volumes-step-size-description: Adjust the step size for volume changes (scroll wheel, keyboard shortcuts).
audio.volumes-volume-feedback-description: Play a feedback sound when adjusting volume.
audio.volumes-volume-overdrive-description: Allow raising volume above 100%. May not be supported by all hardware.

bar.appearance-auto-hide-delay-description: Time before bar hides after mouse leaves
bar.appearance-auto-hide-exclusive-note: Note: Exclusive zone is automatically disabled when auto-hide is active
bar.appearance-auto-show-delay-description: Time before bar shows when mouse enters edge
bar.appearance-background-opacity-descriptio: Set the background opacity specifically for the bar.
bar.appearance-capsule-color-description: Choose a color for bar capsules, or use none for the default surface color.
bar.appearance-capsule-opacity-description: Set the opacity level for widget backgrounds when capsule is shown.
bar.appearance-density-description: Adjust the bar's padding for a compact or spacious look.
bar.appearance-desc: Customize the bar's appearance and position.
bar.appearance-display-mode-description: Choose when the bar is visible.
bar.appearance-floating-description: Display the bar as a floating 'pill'.
bar.appearance-font-scale-description: Adjust the font size scale for text displayed in the bar.
bar.appearance-frame-settings-description: Adjust frame thickness and inner corner radius
bar.appearance-hide-on-overview-description: Hide the bar and close panels when the compositor overview is active.
bar.appearance-margins-description: Adjust the margins around the floating bar.
bar.appearance-outer-corners-description: Display outwardly curved corners on the bar.
bar.appearance-position-description: Choose where to place the bar on the screen.
bar.appearance-show-on-workspace-switch-desc: Automatically show the bar briefly when the workspace changes.
bar.appearance-show-outline-description: Displays a visible border around every widget.
bar.appearance-type-description: Choose the style of the bar: Simple, Floating or Framed.
bar.appearance-use-separate-opacity-descript: Enable to use a separate opacity value for the bar background.
bar.appearance-widget-spacing-description: Adjust the spacing between each widget in the bar.
bar.monitor-override-settings-description: Use custom settings for this monitor.
bar.monitors-desc: Show bar on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.
bar.monitors-desc-new: Configure which monitors display the bar and customize settings per monitor.
bar.title: Bar
bar.tray-blacklist-description: Add tray exclusion rules, supports wildcards (*).
bar.widgets-desc: Drag widgets to change their order. Use the right-click menu to transfer widgets between sections or remove them.

color-scheme.color-source-use-wallpaper-colors-descri: Generate color schemes from your wallpaper. Automatically extracts colors to create a cohesive theme.
color-scheme.dark-mode-mode-description: Enables automatic switching between Light and Dark Mode.
color-scheme.dark-mode-switch-description: Switches to a darker theme for easier viewing at night.

method-description.content: Material Design scheme with high-fidelity color extraction that closely matches the source content's actual colors.
method-description.dysfunctional: Like Faithful but picks the second most dominant color family as primary.
method-description.faithful: Attempts to stay close to the source color while still generating a harmonious palette.
method-description.fruit-salad: Material Design scheme that produces a playful, vibrant palette with diverse and varied hues.
method-description.monochrome: Material Design scheme using a single-hue grayscale with minimal chromatic content.
method-description.muted: Generates softer, desaturated tones for a calm and understated appearance.
method-description.rainbow: Material Design scheme that generates colors across the full spectrum for maximum color diversity.
method-description.tonal-spot: Material Design default algorithm. Creates balanced palettes using tonal variations of the source color.
method-description.vibrant: Maximizes color saturation for bold, eye-catching palettes with vivid tones.

color-scheme.predefined-desc: Choose from a collection of predefined color schemes.
color-scheme.templates-filter-description: Show templates from a specific category.
color-scheme.templates-misc-user-templates-descriptio: Only enable if you know what you are doing — refer to our online documentation.
color-scheme.title: Color Scheme
color-scheme.wallpaper-method-description: Choose your favorite palette generation method.
color-scheme.wallpaper-monitor-source-description: Select which monitor to use for extracting wallpaper colors.

connections.bluetooth-discoverable: This device is discoverable as {hostName} while this settings tab is open.
connections.bluetooth-rssi-polling-description: Periodically sample RSSI for connected devices via bluetoothctl. May not be available for all devices; uses minimal resources when enabled.
connections.bluetooth-rssi-polling-interval-descript: Configure how often to update signal strength for connected devices.
connections.disable-discoverability-description: Hide your device from nearby Bluetooth devices.
connections.hide-unnamed-devices-description: Hide devices that appear only as Bluetooth addresses.
connections.pin-instructions: Please enter the PIN code displayed on your device.
connections.title: Connections

control-center.cards-desc: Customize which controls appear in the control center and in what order.
control-center.desc: Configure the control center panel positioning and behavior.
control-center.position-description: Choose where the control center panel appears when opened.
control-center.shortcuts-custom-button-command-descript: The command to execute when the button is clicked.
control-center.shortcuts-custom-button-enable-on-state-: Enable a second icon and 'hot' state based on a check command.
control-center.shortcuts-custom-button-icon-description: Select an icon from the library.
control-center.shortcuts-custom-button-on-middle-clicke: Command to execute when the button is middle-clicked.
control-center.shortcuts-custom-button-on-state-command: Command to execute to check if the button should be in the 'on' state. Returns 0 for on, non-zero for off.
control-center.shortcuts-custom-button-on-state-icon-de: The icon for the button when it's in the 'on' state.
control-center.shortcuts-custom-button-state-checks-com: Command to execute for this state check
control-center.shortcuts-custom-button-tooltip-descript: The tooltip to show when hovering over the button.
control-center.system-monitor-disk-path-description: Select which disk mount point the system monitor card in the control center should monitor.
control-center.title: Control Center

desktop-widgets.clock-enabled-description: Show a clock widget on the desktop.
desktop-widgets.clock-height-description: Height of the clock widget in pixels.
desktop-widgets.clock-minimal-mode-description: Use a minimal clock display with time and date.
desktop-widgets.clock-rounded-corners-description: Use rounded corners for the widget background.
desktop-widgets.clock-show-background-description: Show the background container for the clock widget.
desktop-widgets.clock-show-date-description: Display the current date below the time.
desktop-widgets.clock-width-description: Width of the clock widget in pixels.
desktop-widgets.cpu-intensive-note: Widgets marked with ! use more CPU and should be enabled mindfully.
desktop-widgets.edit-mode-controls-explanation:
Left-click & drag: Move or resize the widget.
Right-click: Open the context menu options.
desktop-widgets.edit-mode-description: Enable edit mode to move and reposition desktop widgets. When enabled, widgets show a drag outline and can be repositioned.
desktop-widgets.enabled-description: Enable or disable desktop widgets entirely.
desktop-widgets.general-desc: Configure widgets that appear on your desktop.
desktop-widgets.media-player-enabled-description: Show a media player widget on the desktop.
desktop-widgets.media-player-rounded-corners-description: Enable rounded corners on the widget edges.
desktop-widgets.media-player-show-album-art-description: Show the album artwork and track information (title and artist).
desktop-widgets.media-player-show-buttons-description: Show media control buttons (play/pause, previous, next).
desktop-widgets.overview-enabled-description: Show desktop widgets while the compositor overview is open.
desktop-widgets.system-stat-layout-description: Choose how the legend is displayed relative to the graph.
desktop-widgets.system-stat-rounded-corners-description: Use rounded corners for the widget background.
desktop-widgets.system-stat-show-background-description: Show the background container for the system stat widget.
desktop-widgets.system-stat-stat-type-description: Choose which system statistic to display.
desktop-widgets.title: Desktop Widgets
desktop-widgets.weather-enabled-description: Show a weather widget on the desktop.
desktop-widgets.weather-show-background-description: Show the background container for the weather widget.

display.monitors-backlight-device-description: Select a backlight device for this output.
display.monitors-brightness-step-description: Adjust the step size for brightness changes (scroll wheel and keyboard shortcuts).
display.monitors-brightness-unavailable-ddc-disa: Brightness control unavailable. Enable "External brightness support" to control this display's brightness.
display.monitors-brightness-unavailable-generic: Brightness control is not available for this display.
display.monitors-desc: Adjust settings brightness for each display.
display.monitors-enforce-minimum-description: Solves the problem of backlight completely turning off on some displays at 0% brightness.
display.monitors-external-brightness-description: Enable DDCUtil support for controlling brightness on external displays via DDC/CI protocol.
display.monitors-global-brightness-description: Adjust brightness for all monitors at once.
display.night-light-auto-schedule-description: Based on the sunset and sunrise time in {location} — recommended.
display.night-light-desc: Reduce blue light emission to help you sleep better and reduce eye strain.
display.night-light-enable-description: Apply a warm color filter to reduce blue light emission.
display.night-light-force-activation-description: Ignores the schedule and applies the night filter immediately.
display.night-light-manual-schedule-description: Set custom times for sunrise and sunset.
display.night-light-temperature-description: Set the color warmth for nighttime and daytime.
display.title: Display

dock.appearance-colorize-icons-description: Apply theme colors to dock app icons (non-focused apps only).
dock.appearance-dead-opacity-description: Adjust the opacity of app icons that are not running.
dock.appearance-desc: Customize the dock's behavior and appearance.
dock.appearance-floating-distance-description: Set the distance between the dock and the edge of the screen.
dock.appearance-frame-indicator-description: Show a small indicator on the frame when the dock is hidden.
dock.appearance-group-apps-description: Group multiple windows from the same app into one dock entry.
dock.appearance-group-click-action-descriptio: Choose what left-click does for grouped apps.
dock.appearance-group-context-menu-mode-descr: Choose how the context menu behaves for grouped apps.
dock.appearance-group-indicator-style-descrip: Choose how grouped running indicators display focused window state.
dock.appearance-hide-show-speed-description: Adjust the speed of the dock hide/show animation.
dock.appearance-icon-size-description: Adjust the overall size of the dock.
dock.appearance-inactive-indicators-descripti: Display indicator pills for all apps, not just the currently active one.
dock.appearance-launcher-position-description: Choose where the launcher icon appears in the dock.
dock.appearance-pinned-static-description: Always push pinned app icons to the left in static order.
dock.appearance-position-description: Choose where the dock appears on screen.
dock.appearance-show-launcher-icon-descriptio: Show the application launcher icon in the dock.
dock.appearance-sit-on-frame-description: Align the dock inside the frame border instead of sitting on top.
dock.appearance-type-description: Choose between a floating pill or a static bar attached to the edge.
dock.enabled-description: Show or hide the dock entirely.
dock.monitors-desc: Show dock on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.
dock.monitors-only-same-monitor-description: Show only apps from the monitor where the dock is located.
dock.title: Dock

general.fonts-default-description: Main font used throughout the interface.
general.fonts-default-scale-description: Increase or decrease the size of the standard text.
general.fonts-desc: Choose the fonts used throughout the interface.
general.fonts-monospace-description: Monospaced font used for numbers and stats display.
general.fonts-monospace-scale-description: Increase or decrease the size of the monospaced text.
general.keybinds-conflict-description: The key combination is already assigned to {action}.
general.keybinds-description: Configure global navigation keys for panels and launcher.
general.keybinds-modifier-description: Shortcuts must include a modifier key (Ctrl or Alt).
general.language-desc: Choose your preferred language for the application.
general.language-select-description: Select the language used in the application's interface.
general.profile-desc: Edit your user details and avatar.
general.profile-picture-description: Your profile picture that appears throughout the interface.
general.screen-corners-desc: Customize screen corner rounding and visual effects.
general.screen-corners-radius-description: Adjust the rounded corners of the screen.
general.screen-corners-show-corners-description: Display rounded corners on the edge of the screen.
general.screen-corners-solid-black-description: Use solid black instead of the bar background color.

hooks.info-command-info-description:
• Commands are executed via shell (sh -lc)
• Commands run in background (detached)
• Test buttons execute with current values
hooks.info-parameters-description:
• Wallpaper hook: $1 = wallpaper path, $2 = screen name
• Theme toggle hook: $1 = true/false (Dark Mode state)
• Screen lock/unlock hooks: No parameters
• Performance mode hooks: No parameters
• Session hook: $1 = action (shutdown/reboot)
hooks.noctalia-started-description: Command to execute when Noctalia has finished loading.
hooks.performance-mode-disabled-description: Command to be executed when Noctalia Performance Mode is disabled.
hooks.performance-mode-enabled-description: Command to be executed when Noctalia Performance Mode is enabled.
hooks.screen-lock-description: Command to be executed when the screen is locked.
hooks.screen-unlock-description: Command to be executed when the lock screen is unlocked.
hooks.session-description: Command to be executed before shutdown or reboot. Receives action type as $1 (shutdown/reboot).
hooks.system-hooks-desc: Configure commands to be executed when system events occur.
hooks.system-hooks-enable-description: Enable or disable all hook commands.
hooks.theme-changed-description: Command to be executed when theme toggles between Dark and Light Mode.
hooks.title: Hooks
hooks.wallpaper-changed-description: Command to be executed when wallpaper changes.

idle.custom-description: Run a shell command after a period of inactivity.
idle.enable-description: Automatically turn off the screen, lock, or suspend after a period of inactivity.
idle.fade-duration-description: Seconds for the fade-to-black animation before each action fires. Any mouse movement cancels the fade.
idle.lock-description: Seconds of inactivity before the lock screen activates.
idle.screen-off-description: Seconds of inactivity before monitors are turned off.
idle.status-description: Idle time as reported by the compositor.
idle.suspend-description: Seconds of inactivity before the system suspends.
idle.timeouts-description: Set to 0 to disable a stage. Timeouts are paused while Keep Awake is active.
idle.unavailable: Native idle monitoring is not available on this compositor.

launcher.clipboard-desc: Access and manage your clipboard history from the launcher.
launcher.settings-annotation-tool-description: Command to run when clicking the annotate button in clipboard history. The image will be piped to this command.
launcher.settings-auto-paste-description: Automatically paste the selected clipboard item. Requires wtype.
launcher.settings-clip-preview-description: Show a preview of the clipboard content when using the >clip command.
launcher.settings-clip-wrap-text-description: Wrap text in the clipboard list instead of truncating it.
launcher.settings-clipboard-history-description: Access previously copied items from the launcher.
launcher.settings-clipboard-watch-image-descripti: Full command string passed to wl-paste for image changes. (requires restart)
launcher.settings-clipboard-watch-text-descriptio: Full command string passed to wl-paste for text changes. (requires restart)
launcher.settings-custom-launch-prefix-descriptio: Prefix commands with a custom launcher (e.g. 'runapp' for systemd integration).
launcher.settings-custom-launch-prefix-enabled-de: Use a custom prefix for launching applications instead of the default method.
launcher.settings-density-description: Adjust the size of application icons and the density of the launcher.
launcher.settings-desc: Customize the launcher's behavior and appearance.
launcher.settings-enable-session-search-descripti: Show session actions (lock, shutdown, reboot, etc.) when searching in the launcher.
launcher.settings-enable-settings-search-descript: Show settings results when searching in the launcher.
launcher.settings-grid-view-description: Display items in a grid layout instead of a list.
launcher.settings-icon-mode-description: Use native system icons instead of Tabler icons.
launcher.settings-ignore-mouse-input-description: Disable mouse interaction and scrollwheel in the launcher.
launcher.settings-overlay-layer-description: Display the launcher on the overlay layer, above fullscreen windows. When enabled, the launcher will not attach to the bar.
launcher.settings-position-description: Choose where the launcher panel appears.
launcher.settings-show-categories-description: Show category tabs for filtering applications.
launcher.settings-show-icon-background-descriptio: Show a rounded rectangle background behind icons.
launcher.settings-sort-by-usage-description: When enabled, frequently launched apps appear first in the list.
launcher.settings-terminal-command-description: Command to launch a terminal. E.g. 'kitty -e' or 'gnome-terminal --'.
launcher.settings-use-app2unit-description: Uses an alternative launch method to better manage app processes and prevent issues.
launcher.settings-view-mode-description: Choose the layout for the launcher entries.
launcher.title: Launcher

location.calendar-cards-desc: Organize and enable/disable cards in the calendar panel.
location.date-time-12hour-format-description: Display time in 12-hour format on the lock screen and calendar. The bar clock has its own settings.
location.date-time-desc: Customize how date and time appear.
location.date-time-first-day-of-week-description: Choose which day starts the week in the calendar.
location.date-time-show-events-description: Display events in the calendar panel.
location.date-time-use-analog-description: Show an analog style clock on the calendar window.
location.date-time-week-numbers-description: Display the week of the year (e.g. week 38) in the calendar.
location.location-desc: Get accurate weather and Night Light scheduling by setting your location.
location.weather-enabled-description: Show weather information throughout the interface and fetch weather data. When disabled, all weather elements will be hidden and no network requests will be made.
location.weather-fahrenheit-description: Display temperature in Fahrenheit instead of Celsius.
location.weather-hide-city-description: Hide the city name from weather displays throughout the interface.
location.weather-hide-timezone-description: Hide the timezone abbreviation from weather displays throughout the interface.
location.weather-show-effects-description: Show additional visual effects (like rain, snow, or lightning) on the weather card.
location.weather-show-in-calendar-description: Show the daily weather forecast directly in your calendar view.

lock-screen.allow-password-with-fprintd-description: When fprintd (fingerprint authentication) is active, this option lets you still login using your password instead of a fingerprint
lock-screen.auto-start-auth-description: Automatically starts fingerprint authentication without requiring a key press or button click.
lock-screen.clock-format-description: Customize the clock format using date/time syntax tokens.
lock-screen.clock-style-description: Choose the visual style of the clock on the lock screen.
lock-screen.compact-lockscreen-description: Show only the login input and system controls, hiding weather and media widgets.
lock-screen.lock-on-suspend-description: Automatically lock the screen when suspending the system.
lock-screen.lock-screen-blur-strength-description: Applies a blur effect to the lock screen wallpaper.
lock-screen.lock-screen-tint-strength-description: Applies a tint overlay to the lock screen wallpaper.
lock-screen.monitors-desc: Show lock screen on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.
lock-screen.password-chars-description: Cute icons used to hide your password.
lock-screen.show-hibernate-description: Show the option 'hibernate' in the power controls.
lock-screen.show-session-buttons-description: Allow access to power settings from the lock screen.
lock-screen.title: Lock Screen

network.bluetooth-rssi-polling-description: Periodically sample RSSI for connected devices via bluetoothctl. May not be available for all devices; uses minimal resources when enabled.

notifications.duration-critical-urgency-description: How long critical priority notifications stay visible.
notifications.duration-desc: Configure how long notifications stay visible based on their urgency level.
notifications.duration-low-urgency-description: How long low priority notifications stay visible.
notifications.duration-normal-urgency-description: How long normal priority notifications stay visible.
notifications.duration-respect-expire-description: Use the expire timeout set in the notification.
notifications.history-clear-dismiss-description: Clear notification from history when dismissed.
notifications.history-critical-urgency-description: Save critical priority notifications to history.
notifications.history-desc: Control which notifications are saved to history based on their urgency level.
notifications.history-low-urgency-description: Save low priority notifications to history.
notifications.history-normal-urgency-description: Save normal priority notifications to history.
notifications.monitors-desc: Show notification on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.
notifications.settings-always-on-top-description: Display notifications above fullscreen windows and other layers.
notifications.settings-background-opacity-description: Adjust the opacity of notification backgrounds.
notifications.settings-do-not-disturb-description: Disable all notification popups when enabled.
notifications.settings-enabled-description: Enable or disable the notification daemon, requires a restart of Noctalia shell.
notifications.settings-markdown-description: Render notification content using Markdown formatting.
notifications.sounds-desc: Configure notification sound effects and volume.
notifications.sounds-enabled-description: Enable sound effects for incoming notifications.
notifications.sounds-excluded-apps-description: Skip playing the configured notification sound for specific applications that have their own built-in sounds.
notifications.sounds-files-critical-description: Path to the sound file played for critical priority notifications.
notifications.sounds-files-desc: Configure custom sound files for different notification urgency levels.
notifications.sounds-files-low-description: Path to the sound file played for low priority notifications.
notifications.sounds-files-normal-description: Path to the sound file played for normal priority notifications.
notifications.sounds-files-unified-description: Path to the sound file played for notifications.
notifications.sounds-separate-description: Use different sound files for low, normal, and critical priority notifications.
notifications.sounds-unavailable-description: Install Qt6 Multimedia to enable notification sounds.
notifications.sounds-volume-description: Adjust the volume level for notification sounds.
notifications.toast-battery-description: Show a warning when the battery level falls below this percentage.
notifications.toast-keyboard-description: Show a toast when the keyboard layout changes.
notifications.toast-media-description: Show a toast when media playback state changes.

osd.always-on-top-description: Display OSD above fullscreen windows and other layers.
osd.background-opacity-description: Controls the transparency of the OSD background.
osd.description: Configure on-screen indicators such as volume and brightness overlays.
osd.duration-auto-hide-description: Adjust the time before OSD disappears.
osd.duration-desc: How long OSD remains visible before hiding automatically.
osd.enabled-description: Show volume and brightness changes in real-time.
osd.events-desc: Select which events trigger the on-screen display.
osd.general-desc: Configure visibility and behavior of OSD.
osd.monitors-desc: Show OSD on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.
osd.title: On-Screen Display
osd.types-brightness-description: Show OSD when screen brightness changes.
osd.types-custom-text-description: Show OSD for custom text messages from IPC.
osd.types-desc: Select the events that trigger the OSD.
osd.types-input-volume-description: Show OSD when microphone volume changes.
osd.types-lockkey-description: Show OSD when Caps Lock, Num Lock, or Scroll Lock are toggled.
osd.types-media-description: Show OSD when media playback state changes (play, pause, skip).
osd.types-volume-description: Show OSD when audio output volume changes.

plugins.auto-update-description: Automatically update all plugins when the shell starts.
plugins.available-description: Browse and install plugins from configured sources.
plugins.available-no-plugins-description: Check your plugin sources or refresh the list.
plugins.collision-custom-version-exists: A custom version from "{source}" is already installed
plugins.collision-official-version-exists: The official version of this plugin is already installed
plugins.development-disable: Disable development mode for this plugin
plugins.development-enable: Enable development mode for this plugin
plugins.filter-tags-description: Filter plugins by category or download status.
plugins.hot-reload-description: Automatically reload plugins when their files change. Useful for plugin development.
plugins.installed-description: Manage and configure all locally installed plugins.
plugins.sources-add-dialog-description: Add a GitHub repository as a plugin source.
plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.uninstall-dialog-description: Are you sure you want to uninstall {plugin}? This will remove all plugin data.

session-menu.countdown-duration-description: Set how long the countdown timer lasts before executing power actions.
session-menu.enable-countdown-description: Show a countdown timer before executing power actions.
session-menu.entries-desc: Customize which power actions appear in the session menu and in what order.
session-menu.entry-settings-command-description: Custom command to execute for this action. Leave empty to use the default system command.
session-menu.entry-settings-default-info-description: If no custom command is specified, the default system command will be used.
session-menu.entry-settings-keybind-description: Assign a key combination to trigger this action when the session menu is open.
session-menu.entry-settings-keybind-placeholder: Press Record to assign a key...
session-menu.general-desc: Configure the session menu panel behavior and appearance.
session-menu.large-buttons-layout-description: Choose how session menu buttons are displayed.
session-menu.large-buttons-style-description: Display the session menu with large buttons in a grid layout.
session-menu.position-description: Choose where the session menu panel appears when opened.
session-menu.show-header-description: Display the title and close button at the top of the session menu.
session-menu.show-keybinds-description: Display keybind hints on session options.

system-monitor.enable-dgpu-monitoring-description: Warning: This will wake up your discrete GPU (NVIDIA/AMD), which may significantly impact battery life on laptops with hybrid graphics.
system-monitor.external-monitor-description: Enter the command or application path to launch when activating the external system monitor application.
system-monitor.external-monitor-placeholder: resources || missioncenter || jdsystemmonitor || corestats || system-monitoring-center || gnome-system-monitor || plasma-systemmonitor || mate-system-monitor || ukui-system-monitor || deepin-system-monitor || pantheon-system-monitor
system-monitor.general-desc: Configure the system monitor behavior and appearance.
system-monitor.polling-section-description: Configure how often each system metric is updated.
system-monitor.thresholds-section-description: Adjust warning/critical thresholds for each system metric.
system-monitor.use-custom-highlight-colors-description: When disabled, theme default highlight colors are used.

user-interface.allow-panels-without-bar-description: When enabled, panels can open on any screen. When disabled, panels will only open on screens that have a bar, which can reduce memory usage.
user-interface.allow-panels-without-bar-label: Allow panels on screens without a bar
user-interface.animation-disable-description: Disable all animations for a faster, more responsive experience.
user-interface.appearance-desc: Customize visual elements like tooltips, borders, and shadows.
user-interface.box-border-description: Display an outline around content areas.
user-interface.box-border-radius-description: Adjusts the corner roundness of major layout sections, such as sidebars, cards, and content panels.
user-interface.control-border-radius-description: Controls the curvature of interactive elements, including buttons, toggles, and text fields.
user-interface.desc: Customize the look, feel, and behavior of the interface.
user-interface.dim-desktop-description: Dim the desktop when panels or menus are open.
user-interface.dimmer-opacity-description: Set the opacity level for desktop dimming.
user-interface.panel-background-opacity-description: Set the background opacity for all panels (bar, launcher, settings, etc...).
user-interface.panels-attached-to-bar-description: Panels lock to the bar and screen edges, creating a seamless look with stylish inverted corners.
user-interface.panels-overlay-description: Ensures panels and the bar remain visible, even over fullscreen applications.
user-interface.scaling-description: Changes the size of the general user interface, excluding the bar.
user-interface.settings-panel-sidebar-card-style-descri: Wraps the settings sidebar in a filled background with rounded corners.
user-interface.shadows-description: Enables drop shadows under bars and panels.
user-interface.shadows-direction-description: Choose where the shadow is cast to.
user-interface.title: User Interface
user-interface.tooltips-description: Enable or disable tooltips throughout the interface.

wallpaper.automation-change-mode-description: Choose how wallpapers are selected when changing automatically.
wallpaper.automation-interval-description: How often to change wallpapers automatically.
wallpaper.automation-random-wallpaper-description: Schedule random wallpaper changes at regular intervals.
wallpaper.automation-scheduled-change-description: Automatically change wallpapers at regular intervals.
wallpaper.look-feel-edge-smoothness-description: Applies a soft, feathered effect to the edge of transitions.
wallpaper.look-feel-fill-color-description: Choose a fill color that may appear behind the wallpaper.
wallpaper.look-feel-fill-mode-description: Select how the image should scale to match your monitor's resolution.
wallpaper.look-feel-skip-startup-transition-descri: Skip the wallpaper animation when the shell starts.
wallpaper.look-feel-transition-duration-descriptio: Duration of transition animations in seconds.
wallpaper.look-feel-transition-type-description: Animation type when switching between wallpapers.
wallpaper.settings-desc: Control how wallpapers are managed and displayed.
wallpaper.settings-enable-management-description: Manage wallpapers with Noctalia. Uncheck if you prefer using another application.
wallpaper.settings-enable-overview-description: Applies a blurred and dimmed wallpaper to the overview screen.
wallpaper.settings-folder-description: Path to your main wallpaper folder.
wallpaper.settings-monitor-specific-description: Set a different wallpaper folder for each monitor.
wallpaper.settings-overview-blur-strength-descript: Applies the blur strength to the overview.
wallpaper.settings-overview-tint-description: Applies the tint strength to the overview.
wallpaper.settings-recursive-search-description: Also search for wallpapers in subfolders of the wallpaper directory.
wallpaper.settings-selector-position-description: Choose where the wallpaper selector panel appears.
wallpaper.settings-view-mode-description: Choose how wallpapers are displayed from your directory.

placeholders.enter-command: Enter command to execute (app or custom script)
placeholders.enter-ipc-identifier: Enter unique identifier for IPC commands
placeholders.enter-text-to-collapse: e.g. 'nothing is playing'. Use /regex/ for patterns.
placeholders.search-launcher: Search entries... or use > for commands

appearance.subheader: Choose Dark Mode and color sources (wallpaper or predefined).

customize.subheader: Adjust bar position, density, scaling and more.

setup.telemetry-wizard-note: You're in control — enable or disable this anytime in settings
setup.telemetry-wizard-subtitle: We've added anonymous analytics to help improve Noctalia

wallpaper.choose-dir: Choose a directory containing your wallpaper images
wallpaper.dir-description: Choose the folder containing your wallpapers.
wallpaper.no-valid: No valid image files found in: {dir}
wallpaper.subheader: Set the mood with a beautiful background.

setup.welcome-note: Just a few basics to get you started — full options are in the settings
setup.welcome-subtitle: Let's make your desktop uniquely yours

battery.critical-desc: Battery is at {percent}% — please connect the charger immediately
battery.low-desc: Battery is at {percent}% — please connect the charger

bluetooth.confirm-code: Confirm code {value} on the other device.
bluetooth.display-code: Enter code {value} on the other device.
bluetooth.pincode-required: PIN code required by the device.

clipboard.unavailable-desc: The 'cliphist' application is not installed. Please install it to use clipboard history features

do-not-disturb.enabled-desc: You'll find these notifications in your history

toast.donation-opened: Donation page opened in your browser

missing-control-center.description: The control center widget has been removed from the bar. To access it from the bar again, you will need to re-add the widget. You can open it with right clicking on the bar too
missing-control-center.label: Last control center widget removed

theming-processor-failed.desc-generic: Encountered an error while processing templates
theming-processor-failed.title: Templating processing failed

browse.go-up-hint: Use the back button to navigate up.

wallpaper.configure-directory: Configure your wallpaper directory with images.

panel.apikey-help: An API key is required to access NSFW content.
panel.apply-all-monitors-description: Apply the selected wallpaper to all monitors.
panel.title: Wallpaper Selector

wallhaven.no-results: No wallpapers found. Try a different search query.

color-picker.palette-description: Choose from a wide range of predefined colors.
color-picker.palette-theme-colors: Quick access to your theme's color palette.
color-picker.title: Color picker

datetime-tokens.month-number-leading-zero: Month as number with leading zero (01-12)
datetime-tokens.month-number-no-zero: Month as number without leading zero (1-12)

panel.enable-message: Enable Wi‑Fi to see available networks.
panel.title: Wi‑Fi
